title: Kenya Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Kenya increased to 12.41 percent in September from 12.38 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Kenya averaged 15.95 percent from 1971 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 32.28 percent in April of 1994 and a record low of 9 percent in January of 1972. In Kenya, the bank lending rate is the upper rate of interest charged on unsecured loans by commercial banks to private individuals and companies. This page provides - Kenya Bank Lending Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: IMF
